title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Conceptual Understanding Improvement Program Based on Theory of Higher Education Learning (THEL)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the five core variables of the Theory of Higher Education Learning (THEL): gender, age, opportunity, instructor knowledge, and instructor confidence.
Learners will be able to propose three or more teacher-learner interaction strategies for understanding difficult concepts in science.
Learners will be able to analyze individual learning barriers and design improvement plans using self-diagnosis tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
